title: Live Nation font?
content:
First off i ve been a ghost user of this site and would like to say that i find that all of the feedback have helped me learn so much faster!amazing.

I ve been looking at this logo type ( [www.livenation.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223160045/http:/www.livenation.com/ "www.livenation.com")) and I know i ve ssen it before; however I can't seem to nail it.

Any suggestions would be great thanks!
author: bananze

comments.content:
I think [Armchair Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20150223160045/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_armchair.html) from Psy/Ops would match this pretty well.

P.S. Please use a title for your posts. "LIVE NATION font" would have been a good one for this post.

- Mike Yanega
